thread.title: Liz Miles
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Liz Miles

author: Liz Miles
title: Liz Miles
text:
Our BeachMaster, Toby Wills, was excellent! There was a lot of back and forth checking different dates, hotels, and flights. He was so patient with us until we found the perfect vacation for our family. This is the second time we've worked with Toby and he's been professional, courteous, patient, and kind each time.
Many thanks!
